fullText:
While health insurance prices are skyrocketing, healthcare costs for CrowdHealth members continue to decline. 

August Update    
Over the 12 months, members have paid (on average):      

Single: $1,730 ($144.17/month)            

Single 55+: $2,815 ($234.58/month)
